alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 04 at 9:50AM EST until March 05 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers... Great Miami River at Miamitown. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers... Mad River at Springfield. ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers... Great Miami River at Sidney. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Great Miami River at Miamitown. * WHEN...Until Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Water approaches summer cottages along the Great Miami River near Miamitown. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM EST Saturday the stage was 17.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon and continue falling to 5.6 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
